scripts.publish: git push origin --tags && npm run changelog && git push origin
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:pre: npm version prerelease && npm publish --tag pre --access public
scripts.changelog: github_changelog_generator && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -am "Updating changelog"
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run coverage
